full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Title (English and French)

* WES Interim In-Service Support (ISS) for Weapon Effects Simulation (WES) System
* Soutien en service (SES) provisoire de la simulation d'effets d'armes (SEA)

### Reference and Solicitation Numbers

* Reference Number: PW-__QT-004-29078
* Solicitation Number: W8486-217384/A

### Publication and Closing Dates

* Publication Date: May 29, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: July 7, 2023 (14:00:00)

### Classification and Description

* Federal Supply Classification (FSC): JX6910B (Training Aids - Operation & Maintenance)
* Description: Interim In-Service Support (ISS) for the WES System

### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* National Capital Region (NCR)
* British Columbia
* Ontario (except NCR)
* Newfoundland and Labrador
* Prince Edward Island
* New Brunswick
* Alberta
* Nova Scotia
* Northwest Territories
* Quebec (except NCR)
* Saskatchewan
* Yukon
* Manitoba
* Nunavut Territory

### Contracting Entity and End-User Entities

* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC)
* End-User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)

### Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Kathie Eddy
* Email: kathie.eddy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: (873) 353-9727
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

### Attachment and Notice URL

* Attachment: [links]
* Notice URL: None

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Service Support
